Improve your Body and the World (because they are linked)


If you care about the world and want to make a difference the single most powerful thing you can do to help is not driving an electric car or recycling but rather becoming Vegan. It takes a little getting used to but your health and energy will improve, it will drastically help the environment and prevent climate collapse and we will live in a better world for all beings, not just humans.
